zh.doc.Email.2146917-2: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。服务器地址支持自定义输入。
zh.doc.Email.2146917-5: 支持输入变量，变量格式{0}
zh.doc.Email.2146917-7: 支持录入多个邮箱地址，可填写变量参数。
zh.doc.Email.2146917-9: 支持填写带变量的动态模板。变量填写规范示例：{0}。填写动态参数后，可对变量的名称、类型、格式进行配置，以便告警通知时填写。

en.doc.Email.2146917-2: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type. The server address supports custom input.
en.doc.Email.2146917-7: Support entering multiple email addresses, variable parameters can be filled in.
en.doc.Email.2146917-9: Support filling in dynamic templates with variables. Example of variable filling standard: {0}. After filling in the dynamic parameters, the name, type, and format of the variables can be configured for filling in during alarm notifications.
